summary: This document contains a transfer request from Jeffrey Epstein to TD Ameritrade regarding the transfer of assets from his account. It discusses the complications arising from an asset that cannot be held by Charles Schwab and provides instructions for completing the transfer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual requesting the transfer of assets from his TD Ameritrade account.

persons.name: Melinda McMurphy
persons.context: Melinda McMurphy is the representative from TD Ameritrade who communicates with Epstein regarding his transfer request.

connections.description: Melinda McMurphy assists Jeffrey Epstein with his asset transfer request at TD Ameritrade.

events.title: Asset Transfer Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein submitted a request to transfer assets from his TD Ameritrade account, encountering issues with an asset that cannot be held by Charles Schwab.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein requested a total transfer out of his TD Ameritrade account.
There was an asset in Epstein's account that Charles Schwab could not hold, complicating the transfer.
Melinda McMurphy from TD Ameritrade communicated with Epstein regarding the transfer process.
